name: PiggyMagic
description:
Story

This story about a Little pig and YES! This is you. who gets the power of magic in the magic wood. You always protect the world from other monsters in the magic’s wood such as rabbit and ghost monster. They want to pass this wood to the human world. You are the last one standing. Please Protect this world!!!

How to play

This game is a very simple control press Q to Jump and press E to Dash to control your character and Left-click to shoot the magic’s bullet. REMEMBER! DON’T let the enemy pass you!! and get the score to 1000 for your chicken diner.

Control button 

Q = Jump

 E = Dash 

Left-click = shoot 

Team member

Napatsawan Kulmee
